thread.title: Trump’s Budget Cuts Funding For Manufacturing Program

author: Andrew Tangel
title: Trump’s Budget Cuts Funding For Manufacturing Program

organizations.name: trump’s budget cuts funding for manufacturing program

text:
President Donald Trump’s proposed budget calls for eliminating federal funding of a program to support small manufacturers that officials say created or protected more than 100,000 jobs in the last fiscal year alone.
The proposed $125 million cut would slash budgets for 51 local offices affiliated with the Manufacturing Extension Partnership for fiscal 2019.

Local... RELATED VIDEO Spending Deal Means Trillion-Dollar Deficits WSJ's Gerald F. Seib explains why the budget deficit is set to top $1 trillion this year, thanks to tax cuts and increases in military and nonmilitary spending. Photo: Getty
